title: Zombie Kiss - Novel Updates
genre: Drama   Horror   Mature   Mystery   Psychological   Supernatural   Tragedy
author: Kan
description:
'Ariya', a man enticed by death...
'Vakin', a man who admires those with will to live...
And 'Lilith', an Angel's Corpse in between two extremes...
These are the stories...
Of a bond spiraling into madness.>
